data.name: Pandapool
data.description: Cute and cuddly doesn't begin to describe the power of Pandapool. No, really. He's a deadly giant panda with katanas and a grenade launcher. What more do you people want?

starItems.name: Pandapool
starItems.description: Cute and cuddly doesn't begin to describe the power of Pandapool. No, really. He's a deadly giant panda with katanas and a grenade launcher. What more do you people want?

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times.

This attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times.

This attack cannot be blocked.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times.

This attack cannot be blocked.

4.description:

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times.

This attack cannot be blocked.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times.

This attack cannot be blocked.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>275%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times.

This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health + gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Healing

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary and adjacent targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Healing

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health + gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health + gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>130%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Healing

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute <color=#86e619>200%</color> of the Health stolen to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to a random Deadpool ally.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.
Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute <color=#86e619>200%</color> of the Health stolen to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to a random Deadpool ally.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to all enemies
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies

Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to a random Deadpool ally.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Healing
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to a random Deadpool ally.

Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute <color=#86e619>200%</color> of the Health stolen to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
Steal +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Health
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
Steal <color=#86e619>20%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute <color=#86e619>200%</color> of the Health stolen to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color>, and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to a random Deadpool ally.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

1.description:
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health: clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self; gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>; heal all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health; and apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.

On ally Deadpool or Old Man Logan Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.

On Death, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to Revive with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health. For each Deadpool or Old Man Logan ally, gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Revive Chance and Revive with an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, If this character or any <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> ally does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, that character gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage Reduction and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance

2.description:
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health: clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self; gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>; heal all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health; and apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.

On ally Deadpool or Old Man Logan Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.

On Death, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to Revive with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health. For each Deadpool or Old Man Logan ally, gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Revive Chance and Revive with an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, If this character or any <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> ally does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, that character gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage Reduction and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor for self and <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>75%</color> Resistance for self and <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain for self and <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies

3.description:
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health: clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self; gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>; heal all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health; and apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.

On ally Deadpool or Old Man Logan Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.

On Death, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to Revive with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health. For each Deadpool or Old Man Logan ally, gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Revive Chance and Revive with an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor.
Gain +<color=#86e619>75%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>75%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain. <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, If this character or any <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> ally does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, that character gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage Reduction and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance.
3.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> ally

4.description:
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health: clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self; gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>; heal all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health; and apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.

On ally Deadpool or Old Man Logan Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.

On Death, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to Revive with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health. For each Deadpool or Old Man Logan ally, gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Revive Chance and Revive with an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor.
Gain +<color=#86e619>75%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>75%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain. <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> ally.
 > If this character or any <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> ally does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, that character gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage Reduction and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance.
4.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character's Health is greater or equal to <color=#86e619>50%</color>, <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> cannot be applied to this character + Speed Bar cannot be reduced

5.description:
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health: clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self; gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>; heal all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health; and apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor.
Gain +<color=#86e619>75%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>75%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain. <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> ally.

 > If this character or any <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> ally does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, that character gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage Reduction and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance.
